chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
D: cpo
s2: chain D
s1: chain D

Goal:
s1 <=p s2 -> lim s1 <== lim s2

Premises:
Notation cpo := CPO.type
Notation lim := @CPO.lim
Record chain (T : poset) : Type := Chain { pred_of : Pred T; _ : chain_axiom pred_of } Arguments Chain [T pred_of]
Mem_map_inv : ?x \In [seq ?f i | i <- ?s] -> exists y : ?T, ?x = ?f y /\ y \In ?s where ?T : [D : cpo s1 : chain D s2 : chain D |- Type] ?T' : [D : cpo s1 : chain D s2 : chain D |- Type] ?f : [D : cpo s1 : chain D s2 : chain D |- ?T -> ?T'] ?x : [D : cpo s1 : chain D s2 : chain D |- ?T'] ?s : [D : cpo s1 : chain D s2 : chain D |- seq ?T]
sup_mono : forall (T : lattice) (s1 s2 : Pred T), s1 <=p s2 -> sup s1 <== sup s2
dapp_mono : forall x : ?A, monotone (@^~ x) where ?A : [D : cpo s1 : chain D s2 : chain D |- Type] ?T : [D : cpo s1 : chain D s2 : chain D |- ?A -> poset]
chain_clos_mono : forall (T : cpo) (s1 s2 : Pred T), s1 <=p s2 -> chain_closure s1 <=p chain_closure s2
sup_clos_mono : forall (T : lattice) (s1 s2 : Pred T), s1 <=p s2 -> sup_closure s1 <=p sup_closure s2
app_mono : forall x : ?A, monotone (@^~ x) where ?A : [D : cpo s1 : chain D s2 : chain D |- Type] ?T : [D : cpo s1 : chain D s2 : chain D |- poset]
chainE : forall (T : poset) (s1 s2 : chain T), s1 = s2 < -> s1 =p s2
supE : forall (T : lattice) (s1 s2 : Pred T), s1 =p s2 -> sup s1 = sup s2
chain_closI : forall (T : cpo) (s1 s2 : Pred T), chain_closed s1 -> chain_closed s2 -> chain_closed (PredI s1 s2)
In_split : forall (T : Type) (x : T) (s : seq_PredType T), x \In s -> exists s1 s2 : seq T, s = s1 ++ x :: s2
limP : forall (D : cpo) (s : chain D) (x : D), x \In s -> x <== lim s
limM : forall (D : cpo) (s : chain D) (x : D), (forall y : D, y \In s -> y <== x) -> lim s <== x
lift_chain : forall D : cpo, chain D -> chain D
sub_limX : forall (D : cpo) (s : Pred D), chain_closed s -> forall u : chain (subPoset s), lim [sval^^ubysval_mono (s:=s)] \In s
chain_closed = fun T : cpo => [Pred s | bot \In s /\ (forall d : chain T, d <=p s -> lim d \In s)] : forall T : cpo, Simpl_Pred (Pred T) Arguments chain_closed {T}
cat = fun T : Type => fix cat (s1 s2 : seq T) {struct s1} : seq T := match s1 with | [::] => s2 | x :: s1' => x :: cat s1' s2 end : forall T : Type, seq T -> seq T -> seq T Arguments cat {T}%type_scope (_ _)%seq_scope
subp_trans : forall (T : Type) (p2 p1 p3 : Pred T), p1 <=p p2 -> p2 <=p p3 -> p1 <=p p3
CPOMixin : forall (T : poset) (mx_bot : T) (mx_lim : chain T -> T), (forall x : T, mx_bot <== x) -> (forall (s : chain T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_lim s) -> (forall (s : chain T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_lim s <== x) -> CPO.mixin_of T
sub_bot : forall (D : cpo) (s : Pred D), chain_closed s -> {x : D | Mem s x}
subp_asym : forall (T : Type) (p1 p2 : Pred T), p1 <=p p2 -> p2 <=p p1 -> p1 =p p2
sup_clos_min : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) (t : Pred_Class), s <=p t -> sup_closed t -> sup_closure s <=p t
chain_clos_min : forall (T : cpo) (s : Pred T) (t : Pred_Class), s <=p t -> chain_closed t -> chain_closure s <=p t
prop_limM : forall (s : chain [posetofProp]) (p : [posetofProp]), (forall q : [posetofProp], q \In s -> q <== p) -> prop_lim s <== p
fun_limM : forall (A : Type) (B : cpo) (s : chain [posetofA -> B]) (x : [posetofA -> B]), (forall y : [posetofA -> B], y \In s -> y <== x) -> fun_lim s <== x
subp_orr : forall (T : Type) (p1 p2 q : Pred T), p1 <=p p2 -> PredU q p1 <=p PredU q p2
subp_orl : forall (T : Type) (p1 p2 q : Pred T), p1 <=p p2 -> PredU p1 q <=p PredU p2 q
lat_limM : forall (A : lattice) (s : chain A) (x : A), (forall y : A, y \In s -> y <== x) -> lat_lim s <== x
Record mixin_of (T : poset) : Type := Mixin { mx_bot : Poset.sort T; mx_lim : chain T -> T; _ : forall x : T, mx_bot <== x; _ : forall (s : chain T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_lim s; _ : forall (s : chain T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_lim s <== x } Arguments CPO.Mixin [T mx_bot] [mx_lim]%function_scope (_ _ _)%function_scope
Image_inj_sub : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (X1 X2 : Pred A), injective f -> [Image f i | i <- X1] <=p [Image f i | i <- X2] -> X1 <=p X2
prop_limP : forall (s : chain [posetofProp]) (p : [posetofProp]), p \In s -> p <== prop_lim s
fun_limP : forall (A : Type) (B : cpo) (s : chain [posetofA -> B]) (x : [posetofA -> B]), x \In s -> x <== fun_lim s
pair_limM : forall (A B : cpo) (s : chain [posetofA * B]) (x : [posetofA * B]), (forall y : [posetofA * B], y \In s -> y <== x) -> pair_lim s <== x
app_chain : forall (A : Type) (T : poset), chain [posetofA -> T] -> A -> chain T
lat_limP : forall (A : lattice) (s : chain A) (x : A), x \In s -> x <== lat_lim s
image_chain : forall T1 T2 : poset, chain T1 -> forall f : T1 -> T2, monotone f -> chain T2
subp_or : forall (T : Type) (p1 p2 q : Pred T), p1 <=p q /\ p2 <=p q < -> PredU p1 p2 <=p q
sub_limM : forall (D : cpo) (s : Pred D) (C : chain_closed s) (u : chain (subPoset s)) (x : subPoset s), (forall y : subPoset s, y \In u -> y <== x) -> sub_lim C u <== x
subp_andr : forall (T : Type) (p1 p2 q : Pred T), p1 <=p p2 -> (fun x : T => q x /\ p1 x) <=p (fun x : T => q x /\ p2 x)
subp_andl : forall (T : Type) (p1 p2 q : Pred T), p1 <=p p2 -> (fun x : T => p1 x /\ q x) <=p (fun x : T => p2 x /\ q x)
poset_trans : forall (T : poset) (y x z : T), x <== y -> y <== z -> x <== z

intros H.
unfold Order.leqP in H.
intros.
apply supE.
apply sup_mono.
apply H.

original: intros. intros H. unfold Order.leqP in H. intros. apply supE. apply sup_mono. apply H.
